lead_paragraph: Over the last year, the rate of click fraud has risen drastically, according to a firm that analyzes traffic on behalf of advertisers and ad networks.
snippet: Over the last year, the rate of click fraud has risen drastically, according to a firm that analyzes traffic on behalf of advertisers and ad networks.

headline.main: Click Fraud Climbs With Mobile Gear
headline.seo: Click Fraud for Online Ads Is Said to Be Soaring
headline.print_headline: Click Fraud Climbs With Mobile Gear
